data.eml:eml: A new species of the genus Ishikawatrechus (Coleoptera, Trechinae) from Japan

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Sugaya, Kazuki, Yamasako, Junsuke (2014): A new species of the genus Ishikawatrechus (Coleoptera, Trechinae) from Japan. Zootaxa 3768 (2): 189-195, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3768.2.6
